segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her dress and apron, methodically drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window illuminates the countertops nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet gushing water into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, drenching the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed, standing right in the accumulating water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are busy with their own adventure nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the step stool, arm deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles under him, threatening to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl assisting, her palm up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of kids being kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks inviting, so orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will catch them in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could be a funny story later, if no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
